title: Responding when a Kid Misbehaves
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Leman and Mrs. Daly
itunes:summary:
It's embarrassing when your child misbehaves, especially in public. How can you choose to use effective discipline in that situation? John and Danny share why being too strict is not helpful with discipline. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman and Jean Daly.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Why Your Kids Misbehave--And What to Do About It" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-31?refcd=1416204

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/responding-when-a-kid-misbehaves/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/understanding-the-root-of-your-child-s-misbehavior-digital/?refcd=1416204

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
